original_text: And that first slaughter, which Jonathan and his armourbearer made, was about twenty men, within as it were an half acre of land, which a yoke of oxen might plow.
korean_text: 요나단과 그 무기를 든 자가 반나절 갈이 땅 안에서 처음으로 쳐죽인 자가 이십 명 가량이라

sentences.original_text: which Jonathan and his armourbearer made
sentences.korean_translation: 요나단과 그의 무기 맨이 저지른 것으로

sentences.original_text: within as it were an half acre of land
which a yoke of oxen might plow
sentences.korean_translation: 한 쌍의 소가 갈 수 있는 땅에서였습니다
